LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: Just as we stepped out into the hallway, we ran into Hiragino coming up the stairs.

LABEL: 0x304
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x38E
STRING: 「Oh, Katagiri-kun and...

LABEL: 0x405
STRING: Oh, no...」

LABEL: 0x426
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: He looked away awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x464
STRING: What the...?

LABEL: 0x4A7
STRING: 「Sousuke-san!」

LABEL: 0x4C8
STRING: Tokiwa then raised her hands in a banzai-like gesture.

LABEL: 0x506
STRING: My left arm went up with her...

LABEL: 0x536
STRING: 「Oh, umm, this is――」

LABEL: 0x55A
STRING: Come to think of it, I'd been holding her hand ever since.

LABEL: 0x598
STRING: If we came out of the theater room looking like this, even Hiragino would avert his eyes.

LABEL: 0x5EF
STRING: If I didn't clear up this strange misunderstanding soon, then――

LABEL: 0x61F
STRING: But, before I could shake her hand off, Tokiwa let go of mine herself.

LABEL: 0x738
STRING: 「Yaay! Sousuke-san!」

LABEL: 0x7AF
STRING: 「I won't let you go again!」

LABEL: 0x842
STRING: 「Get off me!」

LABEL: 0x85F
STRING: Tokiwa hugged Hiragino firmly with both arms.

LABEL: 0x89D
STRING: Hiragino, on the other hand, rejected her with a blatantly disgusted expression, not out of shame or restraint.

LABEL: 0x921
STRING: ...How should I put it...? What the heck was this?

LABEL: 0x94D
STRING: I quickly retracted my left hand, which was left behind.

LABEL: 0x985
STRING: I felt a mysterious sense of alienation... not that I wanted to join them, though.

LABEL: 0x9BF
STRING: Hiragino pushed Tokiwa's head away.

LABEL: 0xAB6
STRING: 「What are you guys doing here?」

LABEL: 0xAEC
STRING: 「I thought you were waiting in the wheelhouse...」

LABEL: 0xB23
STRING: 「Well, Tokiwa started crying all of a sudden――」

LABEL: 0xCDA
STRING: Tokiwa suddenly made a strange noise and stared at me.

LABEL: 0xD0C
STRING: Her expression was serious.

LABEL: 0xD20
STRING: ...What was with the straight face?

LABEL: 0xD42
STRING: I got what she was trying to say, but this wasn't the reaction I was looking for...

LABEL: 0xD8C
STRING: Well, let's just play along.

LABEL: 0xDD2
STRING: 「I just wanted to know a few things.」

LABEL: 0xDFC
STRING: 「But it's okay now. I'll share the details with you later.」

LABEL: 0xF07
STRING: 「Is that so...?」

LABEL: 0xF2A
STRING: 「A-Anyway, what happened with Reiri?」

LABEL: 0xFCA
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xFEB
STRING: Hiragino's face clouded over.

LABEL: 0x1066
STRING: Tokiwa, who was clinging to one half of his body, shivered.

LABEL: 0x10B5
STRING: 「You didn't find her yet?」

LABEL: 0x114D
STRING: 「No. I looked all the way from the first floor to the third, but couldn't find her.」

LABEL: 0x11A4
STRING: 「No way... It's not like she could just up and disappear.」

LABEL: 0x11DE
STRING: 「You didn't check every room, did you?」

LABEL: 0x1229
STRING: 「I didn't check the rooms I wasn't authorized to, of course.」

LABEL: 0x12BC
STRING: 「But then again, she shouldn't be allowed inside those rooms either.」

LABEL: 0x130F
STRING: Indeed... He was right.

LABEL: 0x1339
STRING: But this was Reiri we were talking about.

LABEL: 0x1361
STRING: Maybe she had used some kind of trick to get into a restricted area...

LABEL: 0x13B3
STRING: After searching this long and not finding her, that was looking increasingly likely.

LABEL: 0x145B
STRING: My counterfeit master key should be able to get me into those areas.

LABEL: 0x14AD
STRING: I couldn't enter the wheelhouse... but my range of action was wider than the average passenger's.

LABEL: 0x14F9
STRING: At this point, I shouldn't keep Hiragino in the dark about my forged key.

LABEL: 0x160D
STRING: 「We can enter the restricted areas using my key.」

LABEL: 0x1649
STRING: 「If we do that, we might be able to track her down...」

LABEL: 0x16F1
STRING: 「Wait a minute. How is it possible with your key?」

LABEL: 0x173C
STRING: 「You see――」

LABEL: 0x1767
STRING: 「Because we exchanged it with Yukari's master key.」

LABEL: 0x17A4
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x1826
STRING: 「What did you say?!」

LABEL: 0x184B
STRING: Hiragino raised his voice in surprise.

LABEL: 0x186F
STRING: Oh, right. We did do that.

LABEL: 0x1893
STRING: It was Tokiwa who had traded my keycard with Yukari's without permission.

LABEL: 0x1965
STRING: 「Does Momoi know about this?」

LABEL: 0x1A1E
STRING: 「I made sure she didn't find out.」

LABEL: 0x1A4C
STRING: 「With perfect movement... like... this...!」

LABEL: 0x1A85
STRING: Tokiwa explained while gesturing wildly with her hands and puffing out her chest in pride.

LABEL: 0x1AC5
STRING: Hiragino clutched his head.

LABEL: 0x1AE3
STRING: If I let her talk any longer, it'd only lead to more misunderstandings.

LABEL: 0x1B2B
STRING: I decided to explain everything to Hiragino myself.

LABEL: 0x1B61
STRING: 「...And that's why we have her master key.」

LABEL: 0x1C15
STRING: 「Snatched from the chest of a sleeping Momoi, huh...?」

LABEL: 0x1C48
STRING: 「T-That was Tokiwa, I'm telling you...」

LABEL: 0x1CE6
STRING: 「I'm not sure why you're in such a hurry to come up with an excuse... Honestly.」

LABEL: 0x1D25
STRING: I was just being considerate...

LABEL: 0x1D4F
STRING: Did this guy not know how their exchanges looked to outsiders at all?

LABEL: 0x1DAD
STRING: Hiragino stuffed his mouth with a xylitol tablet he pulled out of his pocket.

LABEL: 0x1DEF
STRING: Was it just me, or was the sound of him chewing and crunching louder than usual?

LABEL: 0x1E39
STRING: 「Well, either way, this will open those doors.」

LABEL: 0x1EDD
STRING: 「I see... So, where's the key?」

LABEL: 0x1F10
STRING: 「Ah, it's...」

LABEL: 0x1F34
STRING: I tried to take it out and show it to him, but...

LABEL: 0x1FBA
STRING: ...It wasn't there.

LABEL: 0x1FD2
STRING: That was strange.

LABEL: 0x1FEA
STRING: The pocket where I always kept my keys was completely empty.

LABEL: 0x2026
STRING: Was it somewhere else...? I searched through my whole body.

LABEL: 0x2058
STRING: But still, nothing came of it.

LABEL: 0x20E1
STRING: S-Seriously...?

LABEL: 0x2103
STRING: I could feel the blood rushing to my head.

LABEL: 0x213F
STRING: Hiragino looked at me dubiously.

LABEL: 0x2163
STRING: Even the spaced-out Tokiwa seemed to have sensed the strange atmosphere and tilted her head.

LABEL: 0x22B4
STRING: 「J-Just wait a second!」

LABEL: 0x22DA
STRING: No, no, no, no.

LABEL: 0x22FA
STRING: Wait, wait, wait, wait.

LABEL: 0x231A
STRING: I had borrowed the only master key on the <SHEEP III> without permission, and on top of that, lost it...?

LABEL: 0x2373
STRING: If Yukari found out about this...

LABEL: 0x23B9
STRING: I don't think I'll be able to escape with everyone...

LABEL: 0x2465
STRING: 「Did you lose it by any chance?」

LABEL: 0x2496
STRING: 「No... well...」

LABEL: 0x24C7
STRING: 「...Or, did you leave it somewhere?」

LABEL: 0x24FA
STRING: 「I haven't used it, really...」

LABEL: 0x2543
STRING: 「Then, maybe you dropped it?」

LABEL: 0x257A
STRING: 「If that's the case, I don't know where that would be...」

LABEL: 0x25A2
STRING: I hadn't lost my balance as far as I could remember.

LABEL: 0x25D4
STRING: I didn't remember falling down or collapsing...

LABEL: 0x25FC
STRING: 「...Or maybe I did.」

LABEL: 0x2633
STRING: 「When and where did you fall?」

LABEL: 0x2662
STRING: 「I don't know if I would call it falling...」

LABEL: 0x2703
STRING: Earlier, when we were heading to the wheelhouse,

LABEL: 0x2729
STRING: I had carried Reiri, who had complained about feeling unwell...

LABEL: 0x2763
STRING: Thinking back on it, she had stuck to me awfully closely back then.

LABEL: 0x28B0
STRING: 「...I'm not entirely sure,

LABEL: 0x28E2
STRING: but it's possible that's when the keycard was stolen...」

LABEL: 0x298C
STRING: 「What are you doing, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x29BA
STRING: 「I didn't think you'd fall for such a simple seduction technique.」

LABEL: 0x29F5
STRING: 「That's not the word I'd use for it...」

LABEL: 0x2A8F
STRING: 「Look at Sousuke-san!」

LABEL: 0x2AB7
STRING: 「Even though a girl of unrivaled beauty like me is throwing herself at him, he won't falter!」

LABEL: 0x2BDF
STRING: 「See! Even if I do this! Look!!」

LABEL: 0x2CED
STRING: 「Stop that!」

LABEL: 0x2D28
STRING: Hiragino gave her a karate chop to the head.

LABEL: 0x2D5C
STRING: Tokiwa crouched down, letting out a strange "Guheh!" sound.

LABEL: 0x2D9E
STRING: Good grief... If you say he won't falter, then stop trying...

LABEL: 0x2E58
STRING: 「But, if Reiri-kun has the master key as you say,

LABEL: 0x2EAE
STRING: that would explain why I couldn't find her even after all this searching.」

LABEL: 0x2EF7
STRING: 「Yeah... I was careless. Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x2F93
STRING: 「We still don't know for sure. We still have to find her.」

LABEL: 0x2FF2
STRING: Hiragino gently placed his hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x3028
STRING: However, if the master key was in Reiri's hands, then we had lost our target again.

LABEL: 0x308E
STRING: Saying that we should find her was all well and good, but where should we begin...?

LABEL: 0x30D4
STRING: 「Tokiwa, any ideas?」

LABEL: 0x3170
STRING: 「I don't have time for that...」

LABEL: 0x31A6
STRING: 「My head feels like it's going to split open...」

LABEL: 0x31D1
STRING: 「Did it hurt that bad?」

LABEL: 0x3265
STRING: 「My heart...」

LABEL: 0x329E
STRING: I felt kind of sorry for her, but if I thought about it calmly, she brought it on herself.

LABEL: 0x32EC
STRING: ...Actually, she was still sneaking glances over to Hiragino while crouching down.

LABEL: 0x336E
STRING: Well, I guess I should just leave her alone.

LABEL: 0x33FC
STRING: 「I guess there's no way around it.」

LABEL: 0x3424
STRING: 「Let's see if Momoi has a spare.」

LABEL: 0x3463
STRING: 「That means telling her I stole her keycard...」

LABEL: 0x34AD
STRING: 「If I do that, won't my life be forfeit?」

LABEL: 0x3559
STRING: 「...Even if you say that, there's no other way, is there?」

LABEL: 0x359A
STRING: I felt weak after hearing that.

LABEL: 0x35BE
STRING: But worst-case scenario, as long as we had the forged keycard, we could enter most areas.

LABEL: 0x3614
STRING: So, as long as we had that on hand, we'd be fine.

LABEL: 0x364A
STRING: For that reason...

LABEL: 0x3666
STRING: 「My own card can open most of the rooms.」

LABEL: 0x3706
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x3721
STRING: 「――I... did a little tampering, you see.」

LABEL: 0x3824
STRING: 「You're a bad guy.」

LABEL: 0x3849
STRING: Ignoring Tokiwa, who had stood up at some point, I bowed my head.

LABEL: 0x389A
STRING: 「...Why would you do something like that?」

LABEL: 0x38C5
STRING: 「Look, the fact is that we need the keycard Yukari-san has at the moment.」

LABEL: 0x3907
STRING: 「If we can just bring her along without filling her in, then...」

LABEL: 0x3952
STRING: 「Ah... I see. Okay, I'll go get her.」

LABEL: 0x39ED
STRING: 「You just wait for us.」

LABEL: 0x3A2A
STRING: I watched Hiragino leave after saying that.

LABEL: 0x3A5A
STRING: Now then... There were only the two of us standing in the hallway now...

LABEL: 0x3AF9
STRING: 「Are we just going to wait here?」

LABEL: 0x3B22
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x3B40
STRING: She was right. Wasting time by just waiting here wasn't good.

LABEL: 0x3B80
STRING: We should at least think of where to go next.

LABEL: 0x3BB0
STRING: 「I can't think of many places to hide inside the <SHEEP III>. Do you have any ideas?」

LABEL: 0x3C75
STRING: 「The library.」

LABEL: 0x3C98
STRING: 「Other than under a desk.」

LABEL: 0x3CC5
STRING: 「Nnnnnn――――――」

LABEL: 0x3CEA
STRING: Tokiwa racked her brain while grunting in frustration.

LABEL: 0x3D8A
STRING: 「Hmmm... I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x3DB0
STRING: 「Like you said, it's not like there's that much space here.」

LABEL: 0x3E30
STRING: 「She could be behind the locked door to the research room or in the laboratory further in.」

LABEL: 0x3E74
STRING: 「Or, around the heating system.」

LABEL: 0x3E9A
STRING: 「There's the pressurization room at the back of the emergency room, too.」

LABEL: 0x3EC4
STRING: 「Or maybe――」

LABEL: 0x3EE7
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes stopped at a single point.

LABEL: 0x3F0F
STRING: She slowly raised her hand horizontally and extended her fingers straight.

LABEL: 0x3F7C
STRING: 「Or maybe, on the bridge.」

LABEL: 0x3FAD
STRING: The bridge――

LABEL: 0x3FC7
STRING: ...I see.

LABEL: 0x3FE1
STRING: It hadn't opened yesterday, but what about now?

LABEL: 0x401B
STRING: The watertight doors wouldn't open if the sensors detected a danger of submersion.

LABEL: 0x4075
STRING: But if the small amount of water that had flowed into the bridge over the past half-day had dried up――

LABEL: 0x40CD
STRING: 「It's worth giving a try.」

LABEL: 0x40F7
STRING: I walked over to the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0x4174
STRING: The closer I got, the more rugged and massive the bulkheads looked.

LABEL: 0x41A8
STRING: It was a double-layered door, if I recalled correctly. It couldn't be forced open with human strength.

LABEL: 0x41FE
STRING: The only way to open it was to press the switch on the control panel next to the door.

LABEL: 0x4264
STRING: I――pressed the switch.

LABEL: 0x43F3
STRING: I gulped.

LABEL: 0x440B
STRING: There was a sea of blood.

LABEL: 0x442D
STRING: A dark, discolored pool of blood extended itself from a corner near the door on the right wall to the floor.

LABEL: 0x4497
STRING: Red filled my vision, occupying my consciousness.

LABEL: 0x44CB
STRING: What had happened here...?

LABEL: 0x44ED
STRING: My breathing grew rough.

LABEL: 0x4509
STRING: I felt like I was suffocating.

LABEL: 0x4521
STRING: Dizziness.

LABEL: 0x45EF
STRING: ――Stop.

LABEL: 0x4607
STRING: Don't get confused. Get a hold of yourself.

LABEL: 0x462F
STRING: I closed my eyes and took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x4657
STRING: And then――exhaled.

LABEL: 0x4679
STRING: I needed to calm down.

LABEL: 0x4699
STRING: The dark red sea entered my vision as I slowly opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x46DB
STRING: And there, lying in the middle of it――

LABEL: 0x4764
STRING: Were small shoes.

LABEL: 0x477C
STRING: Judging by the size alone, they belonged to a girl.

LABEL: 0x47AC
STRING: ...Reiri?

LABEL: 0x47C4
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x47DE
STRING: Those weren't the shoes she'd been wearing.

LABEL: 0x4808
STRING: They were now stained with blood, but originally, the shoes must have been white.

LABEL: 0x4AAD
STRING: Hikari――

LABEL: 0x4AE3
STRING: That pure-white girl who had called herself a poet.

LABEL: 0x4B17
STRING: I had no proof, but her image came to my mind and wouldn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x4B69
STRING: ――She was the only one who wasn't here.

LABEL: 0x4B8F
STRING: It was reasonable to assume that she had long since died after yesterday's accident.

LABEL: 0x4C38
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x4C50
STRING: But even that wasn't something I had any proof of.

LABEL: 0x4C86
STRING: The girl who was not Touri's sister.

LABEL: 0x4CAE
STRING: The girl who was so white that she had caught my eye. Just what had happened to her...?

LABEL: 0x4D84
STRING: Unlike me, who was unable to hide my agitation and confusion and couldn't think straight,

LABEL: 0x4DCC
STRING: Tokiwa remained calm while crouching down to touch the blood on the floor.

LABEL: 0x4E80
STRING: 「It's dry.」

LABEL: 0x4EA0
STRING: 「Not surprising, given that the watertight doors opened...」

LABEL: 0x4F39
STRING: 「Hmm... Hmhm...」

LABEL: 0x4F60
STRING: Instead of me, who couldn't move and leaned against the wall, Tokiwa was nodding to herself while examining the bloodstains.

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: She walked toward the rear section, following the trail left inside the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0x502A
STRING: Having finished her information gathering, she closed her eyes in thought.

LABEL: 0x5088
STRING: 「...Excuse me, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x50AE
STRING: 「Did you learn anything...?」

LABEL: 0x51B7
STRING: 「It appears that this door was opened once before the blood dried.」

LABEL: 0x51FF
STRING: 「Look at the floor over there.」

LABEL: 0x5224
STRING: Saying that, Tokiwa pointed to the border between the bridge and the hallway of the front section.

LABEL: 0x527F
STRING: 「You can see the blood on the floor.」

LABEL: 0x52AF
STRING: 「From the rear section, toward the front...」

LABEL: 0x52D9
STRING: 「Furthermore, considering that there's blood near the sensors on the rear side――」

LABEL: 0x5330
STRING: Tokiwa spoke quietly.

LABEL: 0x5350
STRING: She disclosed each piece of evidence as if she was the protagonist in a detective novel.

LABEL: 0x53A2
STRING: And, her conclusion was――

LABEL: 0x5432
STRING: 「Yesterday, when the accident happened, there was a big shock, right?」

LABEL: 0x5491
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x54BA
STRING: 「Someone was already inside this bridge at that time.」

LABEL: 0x54FC
STRING: 「And then, they hit their head on the rear side sensors there, thanks to the shock.」

LABEL: 0x5559
STRING: I then recalled something.

LABEL: 0x55FC
STRING: The conditions under which the watertight doors functioned that Yukari had mentioned――

LABEL: 0x5706
STRING: 「...The conditions in which the doors close in the first place――」

LABEL: 0x5738
STRING: 「Is when the sensors on the inside or outside of the doors detect water.」

LABEL: 0x578F
STRING: The doors hadn't closed because there was a tremor.

LABEL: 0x57BF
STRING: Nor had they closed because of the accident.

LABEL: 0x5866
STRING: If the sensors were soaked in blood, the doors would activate whether there was water or not.

LABEL: 0x59AF
STRING: 「Then the door closed, and the person was trapped here――」

LABEL: 0x59FC
STRING: If that was true...

LABEL: 0x5A20
STRING: 「That big tremor was right before the accident...」

LABEL: 0x5A56
STRING: 「Doesn't that mean that the doors were already closed when it happened...?」

LABEL: 0x5AAB
STRING: 「I think so.」

LABEL: 0x5ADA
STRING: 「...So, that's why no one was able to evacuate this way during the accident?!」

LABEL: 0x5B2C
STRING: Because the doors were closed beforehand.

LABEL: 0x5B5A
STRING: So――

LABEL: 0x5BDE
STRING: 「That's the conclusion I reached as well.」

LABEL: 0x5C15
STRING: The barrier had been closed.

LABEL: 0x5C33
STRING: An accident occurred,

LABEL: 0x5C65
STRING: and a current of water assaulted the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x5C93
STRING: Those who tried to escape from it, however, were not able to do so.

LABEL: 0x5CC3
STRING: They were trapped and had died in regret――

LABEL: 0x5E46
STRING: I was suddenly assaulted by vertigo.

LABEL: 0x5E68
STRING: I felt dizzy.

LABEL: 0x5E82
STRING: Even after Tokiwa's explanation and Reiri's confession,

LABEL: 0x5EC2
STRING: it didn't change the fact that I was the one who caused the <SHEEP III> to sink.

LABEL: 0x5F79
STRING: 「...Are you all right?」

LABEL: 0x5FA2
STRING: 「I'm fine... More importantly...」

LABEL: 0x5FC6
STRING: More importantly, there was something else we had to worry about.

LABEL: 0x6004
STRING: 「Whether your theory is correct or not...」

LABEL: 0x6044
STRING: 「...Where did the owner of these bloodstains go?」

LABEL: 0x60F3
STRING: All that was left here were the bloodstains and white shoes.

LABEL: 0x611F
STRING: The master of this river of blood was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x6161
STRING: Whether they were alive or dead, I didn't know... But if they were, they had to be seriously injured.

LABEL: 0x61B3
STRING: Where did he―or she―go?

LABEL: 0x62DD
STRING: 「Did they leave here on their own?」

LABEL: 0x6322
STRING: 「I'm not sure. Judging from the amount of blood here, I don't think it would be easy for them to walk on their own.」

LABEL: 0x6374
STRING: 「Besides, there should be some traces left outside...」

LABEL: 0x63B5
STRING: In other words, it would be more natural to assume that someone had taken that person out of here.

LABEL: 0x6407
STRING: If they'd been taken out, and that had happened after the accident, those who could do so would be limited to the survivors.

LABEL: 0x6465
STRING: There weren't many of us―Touri, Reiri, Tokiwa, Yukari, Hiragino, and me.

LABEL: 0x64B1
STRING: Which of us could it have been...?

LABEL: 0x6545
STRING: 「That said, if someone did carry them out,

LABEL: 0x6589
STRING: there would be bloodstains left in the hallways.」

LABEL: 0x65C8
STRING: 「You're right...」

LABEL: 0x65E4
STRING: There had been no indication of that happening in the hallway of the front section.

LABEL: 0x6642
STRING: In other words, there was no blood at all――

LABEL: 0x668D
STRING: 「Unless you somehow washed the blood away with water――」

LABEL: 0x66CA
STRING: ――Water.

LABEL: 0x674C
STRING: The sprinklers――

LABEL: 0x67C9
STRING: 「No way――」

LABEL: 0x67EF
STRING: My vision started spinning rapidly.

LABEL: 0x6823
STRING: This was different from my self-reproach-induced vertigo just now.

LABEL: 0x6855
STRING: This was... excitement.

LABEL: 0x6875
STRING: Everything was connected.

LABEL: 0x6897
STRING: Reiri had disappeared yesterday and was found soon after. At that time...

LABEL: 0x68DF
STRING: ...Hadn't the hallways been exposed to the rain from the sprinklers?

LABEL: 0x6A0D
STRING: ...From the color red, another scene came to my mind.

LABEL: 0x6A49
STRING: The blood on Touri.

LABEL: 0x6A6D
STRING: However, she hadn't been injured at all.

LABEL: 0x6AA1
STRING: 「Did she...?」

LABEL: 0x6AC5
STRING: Did she carry the owner of these bloodstains out of here...?

LABEL: 0x6B07
STRING: I couldn't think of a reason why she would do that.

LABEL: 0x6B9E
STRING: But... what if it was for Reiri?

LABEL: 0x6BD4
STRING: If it was for her sake,

LABEL: 0x6BFC
STRING: if Reiri was involved,

LABEL: 0x6C26
STRING: wouldn't it be easy for Touri to cross the line?

LABEL: 0x6D6A
STRING: 「What do you think, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x6DFE
STRING: 「...I've probably come to the same conclusion as you.」

LABEL: 0x6E59
STRING: Her eyes were downcast.

LABEL: 0x6E79
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0x6E93
STRING: Where would she hide them?

LABEL: 0x6EC3
STRING: This confined submarine―<SHEEP III>―had no place to hide.

LABEL: 0x6F24
STRING: 「Wait a minute...」

LABEL: 0x6F40
STRING: What did Tokiwa say earlier?

LABEL: 0x6F68
STRING: A limited number of hiding places――

LABEL: 0x6FFE
STRING: 「She could be behind the locked door to the research room or in the laboratory further in.」

LABEL: 0x7042
STRING: 「Or around the heating system.」

LABEL: 0x7068
STRING: 「There's the pressurization room at the back of the emergency room, too.」

LABEL: 0x7097
STRING: The laboratory and the heating room... They were too far away from here.

LABEL: 0x712E
STRING: 「The pressurization room...」

LABEL: 0x715B
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san?!」

LABEL: 0x71F4
STRING: I started running.

LABEL: 0x722A
STRING: My destination was the emergency room... and the pressurization room beyond it.

LABEL: 0x7266
STRING: I swung my arms and ran as fast as I could.

LABEL: 0x728A
STRING: Even if I hurried there now...

LABEL: 0x72B8
STRING: However, anxiety made me run.

LABEL: 0x72DE
STRING: I couldn't just walk there slowly.

LABEL: 0x73AA
STRING: I arrived at the emergency room and faced the door to the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x73D8
STRING: Come to think of it... didn't Reiri also peek inside when we came here before?

LABEL: 0x7428
STRING: Why didn't I pursue it back then...?

LABEL: 0x745C
STRING: 「Shit――」

LABEL: 0x7478
STRING: Self-loathing.

LABEL: 0x7490
STRING: I was exasperated at my own lack of sense of crisis.

LABEL: 0x74B8
STRING: Why hadn't I noticed it?

LABEL: 0x74E2
STRING: I had plenty of chances.

LABEL: 0x7592
STRING: 「Goddamnit!」

LABEL: 0x75B6
STRING: With a shout, I opened the door to the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x7652
STRING: ――And there...

LABEL: 0x76D5
STRING: A girl clad in white was lying there with blood pouring from her head.

LABEL: 0x77D5
STRING: ――Hikari!

LABEL: 0x77EF
STRING: 「――H-Hey, are you all right?!」

LABEL: 0x7813
STRING: 「Hang in there!」

LABEL: 0x7833
STRING: I patted her on the shoulder and called out to her as loudly as I could.

LABEL: 0x786B
STRING: It wasn't a good idea to shake her with this much blood loss.

LABEL: 0x78A7
STRING: But... As much as I wanted to resort to unintentionally forceful measures,

LABEL: 0x7901
STRING: I couldn't feel any sensation of life from her.

LABEL: 0x793B
STRING: She resembled a doll, and her originally white clothes were now dyed red,

LABEL: 0x795F
STRING: embodying the emptiness of a loss of life.

LABEL: 0x7991
STRING: Was she dead――?

LABEL: 0x79B3
STRING: That couldn't be――

LABEL: 0x79DE
STRING: 「Why are you in such a hurry...!」

LABEL: 0x7A6E
STRING: Eventually, Tokiwa caught up to me.

LABEL: 0x7A9A
STRING: Still oblivious to the situation, she headed straight for the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x7AE6
STRING: ...Don't.

LABEL: 0x7B00
STRING: She was a girl, even if she was Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7B30
STRING: I couldn't let her look directly at this lifeless, blood-stained girl.

LABEL: 0x7BA0
STRING: But before I could stop her, Tokiwa looked over my back inside the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x7C22
STRING: When she did,

LABEL: 0x7C4E
STRING: what I heard was not a scream of any kind,

LABEL: 0x7C72
STRING: but a voice of bewilderment.

LABEL: 0x7D07
STRING: 「R-Rumi-chan...?」
